The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 15 September is 71,948 (8,292.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 September, there were 1,978 new confirmed cases (228.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 September, there were 2,303 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (325 fewer cases).
